claim: Vikram has starred in the 2012 film Deiva Thirumagal.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Deiva Thirumagal  (  English translation : God 's Daughter  )  is a 2011 Indian Tamil-language legal drama film written and directed by A. L. Vijay and produced by M. Chinthamani and Ronnie Screwvala that features Vikram in the lead role as a mentally challenged adult with the maturity of a six-year-old boy , while Baby Sarah , Anushka Shetty , Amala Paul and Nassar portray other pivotal roles .

claim: Vikram has starred in the 2012 film Deiva Thirumagal.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 2011 , Vikram played a man with developmental disability fighting over his daughter 's custody in A. L. Vijay 's courtroom drama Deiva Thirumagal , an adaptation of the American film I Am Sam  (  2001  )  .
